nl.bioinf.wvanhelvoirt.HadoopPhredCalculator

Class TextArrayWritable

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.bioinf.wvanhelvoirt.HadoopPhredCalculator.TextArrayWritable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class TextArrayWritable
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    TextArrayWritable A Custom Writable class based on the ArrayWritable, but uses Text's instead of Writable's.
